<title level="1" right="Trait">[Potion](/Traits.aspx?ID=672)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 459 <sup>2.0</sup>

A potion is a consumable magical liquid activated when you drink it.
name: Potion
